item.title: About
item.description: Hugo minimalist SPA A minimalist single page application theme for Hugo, with a clear focus on responsiveness, simplicity and elegance. About I love challenges, and making a single page application using Hugo, a static site generator, seemed like a good one. The SPA core is made using plain Javascript (only JQuery is used for the Ajax requests). I aim to provide a simple but powerful design anyone can use, either for personal or professional matters.

Contributing If you want to contribute to this theme, you can make a pull request and I will be glad to check it out. Versioning You can modify this theme as much as you want. If you want to distribute a modified version, you must publish a link to this repository indicating that I’m the original author.

item.title: How to use
item.description: How to use (MUST READ) This is not the usual Hugo theme you can download and start adding contents right away. But don't get scared, you won't need to read all this document in order to create your site. Unless you aim to create something very customized, you just need to read the basics. Making the theme a SPA comes with some essential features you need to know before starting to build your website.
